privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Understand how we collect, use, and protect your information within Expat Compass.

sections.title: What we collect
items: Account basics — name, email, role, and department provided by the university.
Service usage records such as visited guides, forum posts, and support tickets.
Optional profile details (phone number, preferred contact method) that you share voluntarily.

sections.title: How we use data
items: Deliver personalised onboarding content and reminders.
Coordinate support between international office staff and external partners.
Improve platform security by analysing aggregated, anonymised metrics.

sections.title: Your choices
items: Update or delete optional profile fields at any time via “My Account”.
Request data export by contacting the International Office support desk.
Unsubscribe from non-essential email updates directly in the message footer.

privacy.retention: We retain mandatory records for the duration of your campus affiliation as required by local regulations, and purge optional data within 90 days of account closure.
privacy.tip: Tip: when linking to this page, pass the current pathname as navigation state, e.g. navigate('/legal/privacy', { state: { from: location.pathname } }). The back button will return to that path when available.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Guidelines that define the responsible use of Expat Compass resources.

sections.title: Acceptable use
items: Use the platform solely for campus life coordination, information search, and community support.
Respect forum etiquette — no harassment, discrimination, spamming, or unauthorised commercial promotion.
Do not attempt to gain unauthorised access to other users’ data or university systems.

sections.title: Content stewardship
items: You retain rights to original submissions while granting the university a licence to display and translate them.
Official notices may be translated for multilingual audiences; fidelity is prioritised over literal phrasing.
Moderators may archive or remove content that violates policy or presents outdated information.

sections.title: Liability & support
items: The university provides Expat Compass on a best-effort basis; service interruptions may occur during maintenance.
Links to external resources are provided for convenience — verify requirements directly with the issuing authority.
Contact the International Office to report security concerns or policy violations.

terms.closing: By continuing to use Expat Compass you agree to abide by these terms and acknowledge that policies may evolve to align with national regulations.
terms.tip: Tip: navigate('/legal/terms', { state: { from: location.pathname } }) keeps the back button aligned with the originating page.
